array.string: cd "${NOOK_REPO_DIR:-~/Work/git/nook}" && \ if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; source .env; set +a; fi && \ LOG_DIR="${NOOK_LOG_DIR:-~/Work/git/nook/logs}"; mkdir -p "$LOG_DIR" && \ export AI_CLIENT_TYPE="${AI_CLIENT_TYPE:-claude}" && \ export OUTPUT_DIR="${NOOK_OBSIDIAN_DIR:-~/Library/Mobile Documents/iCloud~md~obsidian/Documents/obsidian-iphone/nook}" && \ export PATH="${NOOK_PATH_OVERRIDE:-/opt/homebrew/bin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin}" && \ USER_SITE="$("${NOOK_PYTHON_BIN:-python3}" -m site --user-site 2>/dev/null)" && \ if [ -n "$USER_SITE" ]; then export PYTHONPATH="$USER_SITE${PYTHONPATH:+:${PYTHONPATH}}"; fi && \ "${NOOK_PYTHON_BIN:-python3}" main.py >>"$LOG_DIR/datacollection.log" 2>>"$LOG_DIR/datacollection_error.log"
